Title: White Fang
Writer: Jack London (original novel), Philippe Lioret (scenario,  adaptation and dialogue), Serge Frydman (scenario,  adaptation and dialogue), Dominique Monfery (scenario,  adaptation and dialogue)
Actors: Raphaël Personnaz, Virginie Efira, Dominique Pinon, Frantz Confiac
Plot: Based on the timeless novel by Jack London. A loyal wolfdog's curiosity leads him on the adventure of a lifetime while serving a series of three distinctly different masters.
